00003 import java.text.DecimalFormat;

00007 import newtonERP.logging.Logger;
00008 
00014 public class FieldCurrency extends FieldDouble
00015 {
00016         private DecimalFormat df = (DecimalFormat) NumberFormat
00017                         .getCurrencyInstance(Locale.CANADA_FRENCH);
00018 
00026         public FieldCurrency(String name, String shortName, Double data)
00027         {
00028                 super(name, shortName, data);
00029                 df.setGroupingUsed(false);
00030         }
00031 
00036         public FieldCurrency(String name, String shortName)
00037         {
00038                 this(name, shortName, null);
00039         }
00040 
00041         public String getDataString(Boolean forOrm)
00042         {
00043 
00044                 if (forOrm)
00045                         return super.getDataString(forOrm);
00046                 if (getCalcul() != null)
00047                         data = super.getData();
00048                 if (data == null)
00049                         return "";
00050                 return df.format(super.getData());
00051         }
00052 
00053         public void setData(String data)
00054         {
00055                 try
00056                 {
00057                         data = data.replaceAll("\\s", "");
00058                         data = data.replaceAll("\\$", "");
00059                         data = data.replaceAll("\\.", ",");
00060                         data += " $";
00061                         this.data = df.parse(data).doubleValue();
00062                 } catch (Exception e)
00063                 {
00064                         setErrorMessage("Le format de donnée entrée ne correspond pas avec le type de champ (Currency): "
00065                                         + data);
00066                         Logger.error(e.getMessage());
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 }
